mapper.sql: id, status, member_id, mobile, address, postcode, description, create_time, modify_time
mapper.select:
select
from rw_address where 1=1
and id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
and status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
and member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
and mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
and address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
and postcode = #{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
and description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
and create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
and modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
order by ${orderBy.toOrderBy}

select COUNT(1) from rw_address where 1=1
and id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
and status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
and member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
and mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
and address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
and postcode = #{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
and description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
and create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
and modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.insert:
insert into rw_address
id,
status,
member_id,
mobile,
address,
postcode,
description,
create_time,
modify_time,

#{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update rw_address
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
postcode = #{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update rw_address set status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, postcode = #{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
